resources.string: Welcome to on-line\n secure voting by VotRite
There are no active ballots \n Please, try again later
There are no race in this ballot \n Please, try again later
Network connection error. \n Please, try again later
Are you sure you want to cast your vote?
There are no any candidates. \n Please, try again later
There are no any parties. \n Please, try again later
The Pincode is incorrect \n Would you like to retry?
This Pincode expiration time is already finished. \n Please try other ballots.
Vote for candidates no less than (
Please assign preferences to \n candidates by using \'+\' and \'-\' buttons
Vote for Party (Vote for no more than one)
You have already voted. \n Please try another race.
Please press the highlighted area to proceed.
There isn\'t exist like that ballot.
Ranks must be not the same.
Ranks must be not the same. \n Change the rank first.
This Pincode has already used. \n Please use others.
You didn\'t cast the rest of races yet. \n Are you sure you don\'t want to cast anymore?

To change the rank, touch a plus or minus button. A changed value will appear to confirm your change. Please input other value for each candidate. When you are done, touch the \"Next(right arrow)\" button to continue to the next screen. Touch the \"Skip\" button to skip. Touch the \"Write-In Candidate\" button to add other candidates.

To vote, touch a name. A check mark will appear to confirm your selection. To unselect the name, touch it again. When you are done, touch the \"Next(right arrow)\" button to continue to the next screen. Touch the \"Skip\" button to skip. Touch the \"Write-In Candidate\" button to add other candidates.

To vote, touch a party name. A check mark will appear to confirm your selection. To unselect the party, touch it again. When you are done, touch the \"Next\" button to continue to the next screen. Touch the \"Skip\" button to skip.

To vote, touch a \"YES\" or \"NO\" or \"FOR\" or \"AGAINST\" button. A check mark will appear to confirm your selection. To unselect the answer, touch it again. When you are done, touch the \"Next\" button to continue to the next screen. Touch the \"Skip\" button to skip.
Read each name and review each selection carefully. When you are done, press the \"Cast my vote\" button. If you wish you can edit the voting result by clicking race names.
Change the rank of candidates by clicking the \"Change Rank\" button.
